Description:
Stack creating a VPC and launch EC2 instances within it.
    **WARNING** This template creates Amazon EC2 instances.
    You will be billed for the AWS resources used if you create
    a stack from this template. **WARNING** This template creates
    role for the launching/deleting instances/subnets/interfaces.
    This role will invoke AWSLambdaBasicExecutionRole, please see
    AWS Documentation for details on AWSLambdaBasicExecutionRole. For StackName please specify only Alphanumeric characters and maximum 10 characters as this CFT invoke a nested CFT.

MBInitForCyPerfAgentAZ1.default: Management Subnet (Message Broker subnet C) for CyPerf Agent for AZ1

MBInitForCyPerfAgentAZ2.default: Management Subnet (Message Broker subnet D) for CyPerf Agent for AZ2

ManagementNetworkCIDR1.default: Public subnet (Public subnet A) for AZ1

ManagementNetworkCIDR2.default: Public subnet (Public subnet B) for AZ2

TagBehindApplicationLB.default: Agents Tag running Behind Application LB

TestInitForCyPerfAgentAZ1.default: Test Subnet (Private subnet A) for CyPerf Agent for AZ1

TestInitForCyPerfAgentAZ2.default: Test Subnet (Private subnet B) for CyPerf Agent for AZ2

ApplicationLBTargetGroup.Description: ARN of HTTP target group behind ALB

ApplicationLBTargetGroupHTTPS.Description: ARN of HTTPS target group behind ALB

ApplicationLBHTTPHealthChkPort.Description: TCP/IP port of the ApplicationLB HTTP Health Check

ApplicationLBHTTPListenerPort.Description: TCP/IP port of the ApplicationLB HTTP Listener

CertificateARN.Description: Retrieves a certificate specified by ARN & associate it with Load Balancer's HTTPS listener profile. Example: arn:aws:iam::<AccountID>:server-certificate/<Server certificate name>

ApplicationLBHTTPSHealthChkPort.Description: TCP/IP port of the ApplicationLB HTTPS Health Check

ApplicationLBHTTPSListenerPort.Description: TCP/IP port of the ApplicationLB HTTPS Listener

InstanceTypeForCyPerfUI.Description: Please select CyPerf Application instance type.

KeyNameForCyPerfAgent.ConstraintDescription: must be the name of an existing EC2 KeyPair
KeyNameForCyPerfAgent.Description: Existing KeyPair to login to the CyPerf instances

MBInitForCyPerfAgentAZ1.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
MBInitForCyPerfAgentAZ1.Description: Management Subnet (Message Broker subnet C) for CyPerf Agent for AZ1 (eth1)

MBInitForCyPerfAgentAZ2.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
MBInitForCyPerfAgentAZ2.Description: Management Subnet (Message Broker subnet D) for CyPerf Agent for AZ2 (eth1)

ManagementNetworkCIDR1.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
ManagementNetworkCIDR1.Description: Public subnet (Public subnet A) for AZ1 (eth0)

ManagementNetworkCIDR2.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
ManagementNetworkCIDR2.Description: Public subnet (Public subnet B) for AZ2 (eth0)

AllowedSubnet1.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
AllowedSubnet1.Description: Subnet range allowed to access deployed AWS resources

TagBehindApplicationLB.Description: CyPerf Agent Tag running behind Application LB

TestInitForCyPerfAgentAZ1.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
TestInitForCyPerfAgentAZ1.Description: Test Subnet (Private subnet A) for CyPerf Agent for AZ1 (eth0)

TestInitForCyPerfAgentAZ2.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
TestInitForCyPerfAgentAZ2.Description: Test Subnet (Private subnet B) for CyPerf Agent for AZ2 (eth0)

Username.Description: Enter Team or Individual email id  Responsible for the Stack.

VPCCIDR.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

ScaleCapacityMax.Description: Number of maximum CyPerf Agent to run

ScaleCapacityMin.Description: Number of minimum CyPerf Agent to run

NetworkOutBytesPerMinute.Description: Average network out capacity to trigger auto scaling
